answers.answer: The drink spikes your sugar very high. The first drink is like chugging two 12 ounce sodas back to back. The test is to see how effectively your body metabolizes sugar while pregnant, some women don't make enough insulin while pregnant. Its not really indicative that you will be diabetic outside of pregnancy. It usually goes away after birth.

I failed my 1 hour test, came back 153 when the cut off is 140. Did my three hour and passed just fine. Same thing happened with my first. Lots of women who fail the one hour go on to pass the three. Good luck!
